name: Tzunami Spambot
description: A Powerful Telethon based Spambot with Filters. Powered by Team Zyntax.

API_ID.description: Get the Api id from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get the Api hash from my.telegram.org

SESSION.description: Get the telethon session from running session.py locally

COMMAND_HANDLER.description: Do not remove the slash before the handler.

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a private group add @MissRose_bot , send /id and paste the id here.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Set a custom pic for alive module
